title: Frispy Chickpeas
directions: 1. Drain and crisp the chickpeas:- Drain and rinse 1 (14.5-ounce) can of chickpeas using a fine-mesh strainer.- Line a medium bowl with a double layer of paper towels. Pat the chickpeas dry thoroughly.- Heat 3 tablespoons olive oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-low heat.- Add the chickpeas and stir to coat in the oil.- Cook, stirring occasionally, until chickpeas are deep golden brown and crisp, 18 to 22 minutes. Taste for doneness.- Line the same bowl with fresh paper towels.- Use a slotted spoon to transfer the chickpeas to the lined bowl. Drain briefly, then discard the towels.

2. Season and serve:- Sprinkle ½ teaspoon hot smoked paprika evenly over the chickpeas.- Finely grate the zest of ½ lime over the top and season with kosher salt.- Toss well to coat.- Enjoy as a snack or store in an airtight container to use as a crunchy salad topper.
